body: Hm, that's probably because of https://github.com/seanmonstar/reqwest/pull/1227. Perhaps a fix is that we could change reqwest to have that internal type be an `Option<RequestCredentials>`, and so by default if you never set one, it should no longer try to set that field.

issue.title: Set RequestCredentials to None by default for WASM

repository.name: reqwest
repository.description: An easy and powerful Rust HTTP Client

body: @VictorBulba I've opened #1249, can you confirm it's fixed?

issue.title: Upgrade reqwest to 0.11.3 for workers wasm support

repository.name: cloudflare-rs
repository.description: Rust library for the Cloudflare v4 API

issue.body: There's a bug in reqwest 0.11.0 which breaks usage in workers (https://github.com/seanmonstar/reqwest/issues/1247)

issue.title: Please Release 0.11.4

repository.name: reqwest
repository.description: An easy and powerful Rust HTTP Client

issue.body:
Hi,

Would it be possible to cut a release for Reqwest 0.11.4? This library is used by Cloudflare in our [Rust API client](https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-rs), and we're waiting on the fix for [this bug](https://github.com/seanmonstar/reqwest/issues/1247) (merged) to be released to Cargo. Until then, our client library is broken for Cloudflare Workers using WASM. 

Thanks!
